price: 9. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyow! Markaad faqeysaan, ha ku faqina denbi iyo colaad iyo ku caasinta Rasuulka ee ku faqa samaan iyo ka joogid (denbiyada) dhowrana (xilkuu idin saaray) Alle, kaasoo Xaggiisa la idiin soo wada kulmin.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا تَنَٰجَيۡتُمۡ فَلَا تَتَنَٰجَوۡاْ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡعُدۡوَٰنِ وَمَعۡصِيَتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَتَنَٰجَوۡاْ بِٱلۡبِرِّ وَٱلتَّقۡوَىٰۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā tanājaytum falā tatanājaw bil-ith'mi wal-ʿud'wāni wamaʿṣiyati al-rasūli watanājaw bil-biri wal-taqwā wa-ittaqū al-laha alladhī ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
